en.title: Quiz Assistant
en.prompt: I am deeply immersed in studying [TOPIC], and I would appreciate your assistance in assessing and enhancing my understanding of this subject. Please provide specific questions regarding it below, so that I can better comprehend the subject matter and address any gaps in my knowledge. The more specific and detailed your questions are, the more accurate and valuable my responses will be.
en.remark: The AI will assist you in introducing relevant knowledge based on the questions you select. Contributed by @ScenerorSun.

metaDescription: Need to test your knowledge on a subject? This prompt acts as a quiz assistant, providing you with specific questions to help you understand a topic and find knowledge gaps.
